name: [WIP] Nightfall
description:
Your plane has crash-landed on a tiny island. Gather resources to repair your plane, but be careful! At night, monsters may come from the ocean to attack you and destroy your plane...

This game was made in 1 week for the Fall 2021 S&T Game Jam, where the theme was "Falling." It was also my first time using the Unity game engine! 

All the code was made by me, but a lot was copied from online tutorials. Brackeys on Youtube was especially helpful.

The plane model was by XXX on OpenGameArt.org

The spider models and animations are by Pixel 32 Studio on the Unity Asset Store.

The trees are by XXX on OpenGameArt.org.
